name: JupyterLab with LLAMA API
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install git curl wget nano python3-pip psmisc cron -y && pip install jupyter jupyterlab torch torchvision torchaudio diffusers transformers accelerate scipy ipywidgets tqdm --break-system-packages && pip install -r requirements.txt --break-system-packages && chmod +x install.sh && ./install.sh
